title: Putin says Russia is ready to compromise with Trump on Ukraine war
byline: Russian President Vladimir Putin said on Thursday that he was ready to compromise over Ukraine in possible talks with U.S. President-elect Donald Trump on ending the war and had no conditions for starting talks with the Ukrainian authorities.

title: Gazette issued appointing 18-member ‘Clean Sri Lanka’ task force
byline: A Gazette notification has been issued appointing an 18-member Presidential Task Force, including the President’s Secretary, to oversee the implementation of the ‘Clean Sri Lanka’ initiative.

title: Fairly heavy showers expected in parts of the island
byline: The Meteorology Department says showers will occur at times in Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces and in Galle and Matara districts.

title: Government extends rice importation period
byline: The government has announced its decision to extend the period for rice importation until January 10, 2025, with the final agreement expected to be confirmed at the Cabinet meeting scheduled for Monday (23).

title: Crowd crush kills 35 children at funfair in Nigeria, police say
byline: At least 35 children were killed and six others critically injured in a crowd crush at a funfair in southwest Nigeria on Wednesday, police said.

title: CBSL names 20 institutions being investigated over prohibited schemes
byline: The Central Bank of Sri Lanka (CBSL) has initiated proactive measures to address the alarming increase in prohibited schemes, which poses risks to the financial system stability and protection of the general public from such schemes.
